author: Karishma Pranav Bhavsar
title: Shahid Afridi urges Team India to come to Pakistan for ICC Champions Trophy 2025, says â€˜Virat Kohli will forgetâ€¦â€™ | Mint
text:
Shahid Afridi urges Team India to come to Pakistan for ICC Champions Trophy 2025, says â€˜Virat Kohli will forgetâ€¦â€™ Former Pakistan cricketer Shahid Afridi urges Virat Kohli and Team India to visit Pakistan for ICC Champions Trophy 2025, emphasizing that sports should be kept away from politics. Written By Karishma Pranav Bhavsar Updated 12 Jul 2024, 10:40 AM IST Pakistani cricketer Shahid Afridi. With increasing speculation that Team India will not travel to Pakistan for the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 , Former Pakistan cricketer Shahid Afridi has now urged Virat Kohli and Team India to come to the country stating that sports should be kept away from politics. Afridi also spoke on Virat Kohli's huge fan following in the country and claimed that â€œhe will forget the love he has for India when he comes to Pakistan.â€
While speaking to News24 Sports , Afridi said, â€œI will welcome Team India. Even when Pakistan used to tour, we received a lot of respect and love from India, and when India came in 2005, all their players enjoyed."
Also Read | BCCI announces schedule for India-Sri Lanka white-ball tour He added, "Sports should be kept away from politics. There is nothing better than politics than both teams playing cricket against each other. Indians coming in to Pakistan, Pakistanis going to India, what can be more beautiful than that.â€
Speaking on Kohli's fan following in Pakistan, Afridi told News24 , â€œIf Virat Kohli comes to Pakistan, he'll forget the love and hospitality of India. He has his own class. There is a lot of craze in Pakistan. People like him a lot in Pakistan. He is my favourite player."
Also Read | Babar, Rizwan get ultimatum from ex-Pak skipper post T20 WC disaster, says this Afridi also spoke on Kohli's retirement from T20Is cricket and said, â€œHe shouldn't have quit T20Is because the format looked beautiful with him in it. Why can't he play? He is fit; he is in form.â€
The ICC Champions Trophy will be held in Pakistan between February and March 2025. Due to strained political relations, India has not played cricket in Pakistan since the 2008 Asia Cup.
Meanwhile, the Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) has planned to request the International Cricket Council (ICC) to relocate their matches to either Sri Lanka or Dubai, newswire ANI reported, quoting BCCI sources.
Also Read | Shaheen Afridi misbehaved with coaches, alleges Gary Kirsten The Pakistan Cricket Board proposed that India play all its matches in Lahore. However, the BCCI is not interested in travelling to Pakistan. Earlier in May, BCCI Vice-President Rajeev Shukla said that the Indian team would visit Pakistan for the tournament only if the Central government allowed it.
Also Read | Afridi comments on Indiaâ€™s WC final loss: â€˜Overconfidence aapko marwah deti haiâ€™ â€œIn the case of the Champions Trophy, we will do whatever the Government of India tells us to do. We will send our team only when the Government of India permits. So we will go according to the decision of the Indian government,â€ Shukla told ANI .
(With inputs from ANI)
Catch all the Sports News and Updates on Live Mint. Download The Mint News App to get Daily Market Updates & Live Business News . title: MC darÃ¡ la batalla contra sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n de Morena, â€œes un fraude monumentalâ€: Ãlvarez MÃ¡ynez
text:
El excandidato presidencial por Movimiento Ciudadano, Jorge Ãlvarez MÃ¡ynez , informÃ³ que se darÃ¡ la batalla en contra de la sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n en el Congreso por parte de Morena y sus aliados, porque permitirÃ¡n que se les quiten espacios ganados en ambas CÃ¡maras. En entrevista en el Senado calificÃ³ de â€œfraude monumentalâ€ la pretensiÃ³n de otorgar una mayor sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n en la CÃ¡mara de Diputados a Morena y sus aliados, asÃ­ como recordÃ³ que ese tema lo ha combatido y denunciado contra el PRI desde el 2015 â€œque se da una sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n grotescaâ€.
â€œEn 2018 se vuelva a dar una sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n grotesca, ahora con Morenaâ€, recordÃ³.
Lee tambiÃ©n SobrerrepresentaciÃ³n, Un podcast de Ana Paula Ordorica
â€œEsto es un fraude, en el singlado, en la sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n que estÃ¡n generando, no deberÃ­a permitirse, yo hace seis aÃ±os presente un juicio ante el Tribunal Electoral contra esa sobrerrepresentaciÃ³nâ€, apuntÃ³.
Dijo que â€œindependientemente del nÃºmero de legisladores lo que hay que cuidar es que no haya sobrerrepresentaciÃ³n, que haya equilibrio y que los votos deriven posiciones, es increÃ­ble que nosotros obtuvimos 6 millones 800 mil votos pues se estÃ© planteando el Instituto Electoral que tengamos menos de la mitad de los legisladores que el Partido Verde, eso no es democrÃ¡ticoâ€.
Por otra parte, descartÃ³ regresar a su curul en la CÃ¡mara de Diputados y criticÃ³ a quienes hoy alzan la voz acusando fraude electoral , pero ya se reincorporan a sus puestos legislativos, dijo en clara alusiÃ³n a XÃ³chitl GÃ¡lvez , quien este jueves anunciÃ³ que se reincorpora al Senado.
Lee tambiÃ©n Notifican a candidata de oposiciÃ³n en Morelos, Lucy Meza, de proceso penal en su contra
â€œNo puedo entender cÃ³mo dicen que hay fraude y ya estÃ¡n regresando a sus puestos , pues eso no tiene ninguna lÃ³gica, si realmente estuvieran pensando en que se puede dar la vuelta a la contienda, pues no estarÃ­an en ese tenor, yo ademÃ¡s me siento muy orgulloso del papel que estÃ¡ haciendo Carlos LeÃ³n quien me ha suplido en la CÃ¡mara de Diputadosâ€, mencionÃ³.
En otros temas, Ãlvarez MÃ¡ynez criticÃ³ el hecho de que se pretendan realizar reformas como la del Poder Judicial previo a que la Presidenta electa, Claudia Sheinbaum , tome posesiÃ³n del cargo.
â€œYo creo que deben de tener cortesÃ­a polÃ­tica con la Presidenta, que le deben de permitir que la configuraciÃ³n del gobierno de la prÃ³xima presidenta de la RepÃºblica se discuta bajo el liderazgo de la presidenta que han electo 35 millones de mexicanos, yo espero que haya sensatez y que le permitan conducir ese procesoâ€, expresÃ³.
Lee tambiÃ©n Sheinbaum obtiene mÃ¡s de 35 millones de votos con el 99.7% de actas computadas

author: Click4r Solutions Private Limited
title: Facing Linksys Velop Purple Light Issue? | Click4R
text:
Facing Linksys Velop Purple Light Issue?
On a Linksys Velop node, a purple light usually means that there is an issue with the configuration or connection. This purple light often indicates that the node is experiencing problems connecting to the internet or is unable to successfully connect to the parent node. This can be the result of problems with your internet connection, a weak Wi-Fi signal, or improper node placement.
The first step in fixing the purple light problem is to make sure the connection between your modem and the primary node is active and secure. To strengthen the signal, relocate the troublesome Velop node closer to the primary node if the internet connection is operational. After moving, attempt to rejoin after the [reset Linksys Velop](https://linksvelopwifi.com/how-to-reset-linksys-velop/).
Restarting the node could be necessary if the purple light continues. Wait for the machine to reset after unplugging it for ten or so seconds and then plugging it back in. If the connection is successful, the node will go through the standard boot-up procedure and the light should become blue.
Removing and re-adding the node to the network via the Linksys app is an additional option. To reset and reconnect the faulty node, navigate to the "Device Settings" area of the app, pick it, and then follow the prompts.
It could be worthwhile to restore the node to factory settings and start the system over if the problem persists after attempting these fixes.
For more details about [linksys velop purple light](https://linksvelopwifi.com/linksys-velop-purple-light-issue/) issue visit our website.

author: Austin Nivison
title: Former NFL TE Eric Ebron laughs off negative Travis Kelce comparison - CBSSports.com
text:
Getty Images Things are not going well for Travis Kelce and the Kansas City Chiefs right now. As the Chiefs' offense sputters, Kelce has taken some criticism, and former NFL tight end Eric Ebron is catching a few shots in the process.
In the Chiefs' 20-14 loss to the Las Vegas Raiders on Christmas Eve, Kelce caught five passes for 44 yards. In the aftermath of that defeat, Kelce has been the butt of some jokes online, including cracks about his performance slipping since his relationship with Taylor Swift began.
One fan joked on social media that Kelce has essentially been Ebron this season, and the latter tight end saw the post. Ebron had a good sense of humor about it but requested to be left out of the current discourse.
Leave Me Alone ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ https://t.co/nGbeFR55L2
â€” Ebron85 (@Ebron85) December 28, 2023 To be fair to Ebron, he had a successful eight-year career at the NFL level. While Ebron may not have lived up to the billing of the No. 10 overall pick, he finished his career with 351 catches for 3,837 yards and 33 touchdowns. In 2018, Ebron went to the Pro Bowl as a member of the Indianapolis Colts when he tallied 750 receiving yards and 13 touchdowns.
Despite his struggles this season, Kelce is still in a position to play for his third Super Bowl ring. The Chiefs can clinch the division this weekend with a win over the Cincinnati Bengals , and Kelce has shown a penchant for making big plays in the postseason.

author: Get News
title: The digital currency platform Enet Crypto Center Limited successfully obtained the U.S. Fincen MSB license, legalizing and regularizing transactions. | Markets | bigspringherald.com
text:
On December 20th, after submitting proof of MSB registration completion, Enet Crypto Center Limited (hereinafter referred to as Enet) officially obtained the U.S. Fincen MSB license on November 15. This marks a further step in Enet's compliance journey, allowing it to legally conduct currency exchange business in the United States, further expanding its international development space. This establishes a solid foundation for serving global users and enables Enet to provide users with safer, compliant, efficient, and convenient digital economic transaction services
Since 2018, the U.S. Department of Treasury and the Securities and Exchange Commission have repeatedly emphasized that MSBs (Money Services Businesses) include virtual currency exchanges and their managers. The regulated entities are businesses and companies related to financial services. The regulatory scope includes international remittances, foreign exchange, currency trading, ICO issuance, and management of prepaid projects. Operating digital asset-related business within the United States requires a license. Hence, Enetâ€™s possession of the license grants it legal status in the U.S., distinguishing it from other irregular platforms.
Enet Exchange has always sought higher-level and broader development. As a global leader in decentralized exchanges, it is committed to breaking national boundaries and achieving global integration. Based on Enet's public blockchain technology, it aims to realize scenario implementations in various fields, including capital, digital asset management, digital asset payment, blockchain charity, blockchain gaming, blockchain entertainment, blockchain shopping, and blockchain community games, thereby creating a complete decentralized digital asset ecosystem.
Holding a license is of great significance for current exchanges. Obtaining official permission from the respective countries reflects the strength and credibility of the exchange. For most exchanges, a license also acts as a natural barrier for selection. For users, Enet's compliant operation under regulatory conditions is a major advantage, meaning their investments will receive legal protection. Under official permission, Enet strictly meets local regulatory requirements and user protection regulations.
Enet will continue to advance its compliance and globalization development, providing safe and convenient digital asset transaction services to more global users. It also calls on other platforms to join the regular development path, contributing to the industry's progress and hoping to achieve industry compliance consensus.
Disclaimer: The information provided in this press release is not a solicitation for investment, or intended as investment advice, financial advice, or trading advice. It is strongly recommended that you practice due diligence (including consultation with a professional financial advisor) before investing in or trading securities and cryptocurrency.

author: PR Newswire (US)
title: eCosmetics: The Intersection of Technology and Beauty
text:
Leveraging Tech Innovations to Revolutionize Beauty e-Commerce
POMPANO BEACH, Fla. , April 11, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- In a world where technology and beauty are increasingly intersecting, eCosmetics stands as a prime example of how to leverage digital advancements and redefine the e-commerce landscape. This innovative platform is not just a beauty retailer; it's a tech-driven powerhouse transforming the way consumers discover, interact with, and purchase beauty products.
A Tech-Driven Approach
At its core, eCosmetics is a testament to the power of technology in enhancing customer experiences and optimizing business operations. Co-founders Alex Irvin and Richard Kirsch , with their rich backgrounds in IT and marketing, integrated cutting-edge technology into every facet of their business model.
The eCosmetics website stands out with its user-friendly design, intuitive navigation, and personalized shopping experiences. A Statista insight report from 2024 notes 34 percent of US consumers will "gladly pay for services that make life more convenient," and eCosmetics is aiming for shopping ease by employing advanced algorithms for product recommendations and leveraging AI for customer insights.
"When people come to our site, they know we already have all their favorite beauty brands and products," says Michelle Chase , eCosmetics' Director of Account Management. "But we also want them to fall in love with something new they may not have found otherwise. Using AI and learning algorithms, we can ensure every customer experience is tailored to individual preferences and needs."
Behind the scenes, eCosmetics' technological prowess is equally impressive. The company's sophisticated inventory management system, anchored in its South Florida distribution center, allows for efficient handling of thousands of products. This system ensures stock levels are optimized, orders are processed swiftly, and customers receive their purchases promptly â€“ all key factors in building customer trust and loyalty.
Other tech-driven efforts include the brand's new subscription service. When a customer knows they need consistent refills of their favorite hair or skincare, those go-to products can be sent automatically to their door without needing to place a new order each time.
Data-Driven Marketing
Under the leadership of Irvin, eCosmetics' marketing strategies are a blend of creativity and data-driven precision. By harnessing the power of big data, the company gains valuable insights into consumer behavior, market trends, and campaign performance.
In a 2023 Statista survey, nearly 58 percent of Millennials consumers and more than 40 percent of Gen X and Baby Boomers wanted personalized product recommendations while shopping online. The eCosmetics team is looking into its own intelligent virtual assistant or sales chatbot for simple customer inquiries as well as individualized recommendations. According to PwC, customers are willing to pay up to 16 percent more for similar services.
This data-centric approach enables eCosmetics to craft targeted marketing campaigns, optimize customer acquisition costs, and, ultimately, drive sales and revenue growth.
Futureproofing Through Innovation
Looking to the future, eCosmetics shows no signs of complacency. The company is exploring emerging technologies, such as augmented reality (AR) for virtual product try-onsâ€”a market projected to grow through 2028â€”and even blockchain technology for security and transparency. These forward-thinking initiatives keep eCosmetics ahead of the curve and signal the brand's commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction.
A shining example of how technology can be harnessed to revolutionize an industry, eCosmetics blends the allure of beauty with the efficiency of technology. It's not just meeting the current demands of the e-commerce world; it's setting new standards for what's possible in online retail. As technology evolves, eCosmetics remains poised at the forefront, ready to embrace the next wave of digital innovations in the beauty industry.
About eCosmetics
eCosmetics is a beauty and fashion online retailer based out of Pompano Beach, FL. Founded in 2019, eCosmetics offers experienced customer service and a fast, easy way to shop for classic, emerging, and luxury brands. Customers can expect free shipping on orders of $49 or more to the continental United States , free returns, and a 100% satisfaction guarantee.
Press Contact:
Alex Irvin
18003498192
View original content to download multimedia:https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/ecosmetics-the-intersection-of-technology-and-beauty-302114900.html
SOURCE eCosmetics
Copyright 2024 PR Newswire

author: Vasudha Mudgal
title: Brittany Mahomes Shares â€˜Frozen Visualsâ€™ from Arrowhead, While Expressing Delight to See Fans Fill the Stands Despite Harsh Weather
text: Brittany Mahomes Shares â€˜Frozen Visualsâ€™ from Arrowhead, While Expressing Delight to See Fans Fill the Stands Despite Harsh Weather [Vasudha Mudgal](/author/vasudhamudgal/) |Published As the [Kansas City Chiefs](https://thesportsrush.com/tag/kansas-city-chiefs/) geared up for their matchup against the [Miami Dolphins](https://thesportsrush.com/tag/miami-dolphins/), [Brittany Mahomes](https://thesportsrush.com/tag/brittany-mahomes/) took to Instagram to share an insiderâ€™s view of the wintry conditions at Arrowhead Stadium. Her posts were a vivid portrayal of the freezing weather gripping Kansas City, where even the windows needed a bit of extra attention. Despite the spine-chilling cold, fans filled up the stadium in hordes, making it a vision in red, something Brittany expressed her appreciation for. Advertisement The first story Brittany shared was a lighthearted look at the pre-game window cleaning. Due to the intense cold, the windows had frosted over, turning the stadiumâ€™s serene views into a hazy wonderland. In her video, Brittany can be seen saying, â€œKeep up the hard work, boys,â€ with fellow suite members sharing a laugh at the situation, highlighting the efforts taken to keep everything in top shape despite the chilly weather. Advertisement Loading embed tweet https://twitter.com/broadyboy101/status/1746378574448427510?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw In another update, Brittany expressed her amazement at the dedication of the Chiefs fans. The stands, she anticipated, might not fill up due to the extreme cold. Yet, to her delight and perhaps surprise, the Chiefs Kingdom showed up in full force. Her story, aptly captioned â€œChiefs Kingdom, be showing up,â€ captured the essence of the fansâ€™ unwavering support for their team. Brittanyâ€™s last visual was a stark reminder of the dayâ€™s freezing conditions. A window, which she showed in her story, was [jammed due to the cold](https://thesportsrush.com/nfl-news-frozen-opaque-suite-windows-at-arrowhead-forces-fans-to-contemplate-if-swifties-would-riot-in-case-they-cant-see-their-goddess/). This was a day when Arrowhead Stadium, with its open dome, could not escape the grip of winter. The Chiefs and Dolphins braved these â€œdangerously cold temperaturesâ€ for a night of thrilling NFL playoff action. Brittany Mahomes Slays in Red and White Brittanyâ€™s Instagram was not just about the cold. It was also a canvas for her personal moments and her support for the team. She was seen donning a striking red jacket emblazoned with Patrickâ€™s number, paired with a white furry beanie. Her smile radiated warmth, even in the icy conditions. The red jacket was a twinning moment with her new bestie and new addition to the Chiefsâ€™ WAGs club, [Taylor Swift](https://thesportsrush.com/nfl-news-adorned-with-custom-travis-kelce-special-jacket-taylor-swift-arrives-at-freezing-arrowhead-to-witness-dolphins-vs-chiefs-game/). One heartwarming picture showed Brittany and Patrick sharing a kissâ€”a moment of support and luck before the game. Another touching image had Brittany wishing Patrick luck, her hand gently resting on his cheek. These moments, encapsulated in her caption â€œLETS DO THISâ„ï¸â€, drew lots of love and support from the fans in the comment section. Advertisement Loading embed tweet https://twitter.com/Vasudha46198333/status/1746390994986434578?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw Fans and friends alike chimed in with encouraging words. Designer Kristin, responsible for Brittany and Taylorâ€™s stunning looks, commented, â€œYou look amazing Stay warm and go get that W â€ Other comments ranged from admiration for the coupleâ€™s bond to enthusiastic cheers for the Chiefs. Another one noted, â€œThat last picture is so cool and so pretty.â€ A comment read, â€œGO CHIEFSâ€ A fan wrote praising Brittany and her love for Patrick, â€œI how you support your man and his team! Way to go girl!.â€ In the frosty embrace of Arrowhead, Brittany Mahomesâ€™ Instagram stories warmed hearts, showcasing the unshakeable spirit of Chiefs fans and the power of love and support, even on the coldest of game nights. And the Chiefs overcame the cold on their home field to dominate the Dolphins during the spectacular win. Advertisement Share this article

author: amolina
title: RodrÃ­guez VeltzÃ© advierte "fragilidad democrÃ¡tica" en el paÃ­s tras hechos de violencia en plaza Murillo
text:
RodrÃ­guez VeltzÃ© advierte "fragilidad democrÃ¡tica" en el paÃ­s tras hechos de violencia en plaza Murillo
Un dÃ­a despuÃ©s de los hechos de violencia en la plaza Murillo, con la sublevaciÃ³n de las Fuerzas Armadas, el expresidente Eduardo RodrÃ­guez VeltzÃ© advirtiÃ³ que existe una "fragilidad democrÃ¡tica" en el paÃ­s.
"Hay que lamentar la fragilidad de las instituciones democrÃ¡ticas no es solamente el acontecimiento de ayer, tenemos un sistema judicial muy obstaculizado por la autoprÃ³rroga que es una suerte tambiÃ©n de golpe contra el propio sistema judicial", afirmÃ³.
InstÃ³ ademÃ¡s a la reflexiÃ³n de las autoridades para que abran un proceso de diÃ¡logo, "plural, amplio, participativo" para enfrentar la "crisis" que se vive en la actualidad en el paÃ­s.
"Es una victoria de nadie, es una alerta para seguir dialogando y trabajando, este no es un tema de candidatos, este es un tema de la gente que necesita soluciones, no necesita espectÃ¡culo", aÃ±adiÃ³.
El Gobierno denunciÃ³ que el levantamiento de un grupo de militares, comandados por el general Juan JosÃ© ZÃºÃ±iga, fue un intento de gestar un intento de golpe de Estado contra el presidente Luis Arce para tomar el poder por la fuerza.
Pero polÃ­ticos de la oposiciÃ³n y del ala "evista" del MAS consideraron que solo se tratÃ³ de un "autogolpe" que estuvo "armado" para subir el apoyo al presidente Arce en medio de conflictos sociales que atraviesa su administraciÃ³n.
